description: This is an HTML file that defines the user interface for a database visualizer web application. It includes layout, styling, and client-side logic (JavaScript) for displaying database lists, tables, and data, as well as handling user interactions such as refresh, select, and expand.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Loads the list of available databases from the server and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list by re-fetching from the server.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the database's table list and loads tables when expanded.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for the selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and renders data from the selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Creates HTML for displaying a data table with support for wide/long content.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for a table cell, handling nulls, objects, and long content.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for better readability.
